name: Como furar uma pedra
description: Single book with instructions on how to pierce a stone:1 Leave a dripping tap above it for 100 years 2 Use a nail and hammer for 3 hours 3 times a day 3 Use a drill 4 Use an ice breaker 5 Use a brass knuckles and punch it  6 Use a needle 7 Paint a wood texture and call a woodpecker 8 Throw it on the floor 9 Use dynamite 10 light a joint 11 Draw a hole 12 Use a shovel 13 Use a hand 14 Poke it nonstop for 150 years 15 Nevermind,fuck it 16 Use a broomstick | 1000x515px year 2016 @BrutasColetivo
